item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:-14 Chances: Lyft and Uber are facing challenges in Minneapolis due to a new city ordinance that increases wages for app-based drivers. The city council’s decision to mandate minimum wage for drivers has led to Uber and Lyft threatening to end service in Minneapolis.
